translatedContent: ImplementaciÃ³n en PyTorch para generaciÃ³n y ediciÃ³n de audio multimodal: genera o edita audio a partir de video, texto y audio, impulsado por razonamiento paso a paso de Modelos de Lenguaje Multimodal de Gran Escala (MLLMs).

originContent: PyTorch implementation for multimodal audio generation and editing: generate or edit audio from video, text, and audio, powered by step-by-step reasoning from Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs).

translatedContent: ## ðŸš€ CaracterÃ­sticas

originContent: ## ðŸš€ Features

translatedContent: - **Any2Audio**: Genera audio a partir de modalidades arbitrarias â€” video, texto, audio o sus combinaciones.

originContent: - **Any2Audio**: Generate audio from arbitrary modalities â€” video, text, audio, or their combinations.
translatedContent: - **Video-a-Audio SOTA**: Logra resultados de Ãºltima generaciÃ³n en mÃºltiples benchmarks V2A.

originContent: - **Video-to-Audio SOTA**: Achieves state-of-the-art results on multiple V2A benchmarks.
translatedContent: - **Razonamiento impulsado por CoT**: Razonamiento de Cadena de Pensamientos para generaciÃ³n de audio composicional y controlable a travÃ©s de MLLMs.

originContent: - **CoT-Driven Reasoning**: Chain-of-Thought reasoning for compositional and controllable audio generation via MLLMs.
translatedContent: - **EdiciÃ³n interactiva centrada en objetos**: Refina o edita eventos sonoros especÃ­ficos haciendo clic en objetos visuales o usando instrucciones de texto.

originContent: - **Interactive Object-centric Editing**: Refine or edit specific sound events by clicking on visual objects or using text instructions.
translatedContent: - **Marco unificado**: Un modelo base soporta generaciÃ³n, ediciÃ³n y flujo de trabajo interactivo.

originContent: - **Unified Framework**: One foundation model supports generation, editing, and interactive workflow.

translatedContent: ## âœ¨ Resumen del MÃ©todo

originContent: ## âœ¨ Method Overview

translatedContent: ThinkSound descompone la generaciÃ³n y ediciÃ³n de audio en tres etapas interactivas, todas guiadas por razonamiento CoT basado en MLLM:

originContent: ThinkSound decomposes audio generation and editing into three interactive stages, all guided by MLLM-based Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning:

translatedContent: 1. **GeneraciÃ³n Foley:** Genera paisajes sonoros fundamentales, alineados semÃ¡ntica y temporalmente a partir de video.

originContent: 1. **Foley Generation:** Generate foundational, semantically and temporally aligned soundscapes from video.
translatedContent: 2. **Refinamiento centrado en objetos:** Refina o aÃ±ade sonidos para objetos especificados por el usuario mediante clics o regiones en el video.

originContent: 2. **Object-Centric Refinement:** Refine or add sounds for user-specified objects via clicks or regions in the video.
translatedContent: 3. **EdiciÃ³n de audio dirigida:** Modifica el audio generado usando instrucciones de lenguaje natural de alto nivel.

originContent: 3. **Targeted Audio Editing:** Modify generated audio using high-level natural language instructions.
